All the news and blogs on one screen.;(function(){ var post_id = location.pathname.match(/post \ /( \ d+) \ /?$/); var search = location.search; var lang; try{ lang = location.pathname.match(/^ \ /( \ w{2}) \ //)[1]; } catch(e){ lang = "us"; } var url = "/"+lang+"/static/legacy/"; if(post_id && post_id[1]){ url += "?post="+post_id[1]; if(search)url += "&
" + search.slice(1); } else if(search){ url += search; }	try{ if(!("classList" in document.createElement("div"))	){ location.href = url; } } catch(e){ location.href = url; } })

();body{ height: 100%;; } #start-loader{ margin: -13px 0 0 -13px; font-size: 25px; width: 26px; height: 26px; border-radius: 50%; position: absolute; left: 50%; top: 50%; z-index: 10; -webkit-animation: load5 1.1s infinite ease; animation: load5 1.1s infinite ease; -webkit-transform: translateZ(0); transform: translateZ(0); } #start-loader > span{ font-size: 20px; font-family: Arial, "Helvetica CY", "Nimbus Sans L"; left: -28px; position: relative; } @-webkit-keyframes load5 { 0%, 100% { box-shadow: 0em -2.6em 0em 0em #CA212B, 1.8em -1.8em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2), 2.5em 0em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2), 1.75em 1.75em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2), 0em 2.5em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2), -1.8em 1.8em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2), -2.6em 0em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.5), -1.8em -1.8em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.7); } 12.5% { box-shadow: 0em -2.6em 0em 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.7), 1.8em -1.8em 0 0em #CA212B, 2.5em 0em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2), 1.75em 1.75em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2), 0em 2.5em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2), -1.8em 1.8em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2), -2.6em 0em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2), -1.8em -1.8em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.5); } 25% { box-shadow: 0em -2.6em 0em 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.5), 1.8em -1.8em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.7), 2.5em 0em 0 0em #CA212B, 1.75em 1.75em 0

1.8em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.7), -2.6em 0em 0 0em #CA212B, -1.8em -1.8em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2); } 87.5% { box-shadow: 0em -2.6em 0em 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2), 1.8em -1.8em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2), 2.5em 0em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2), 1.75em 1.75em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2), 0em 2.5em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.2), -1.8em 1.8em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.5), -2.6em 0em 0 0em rgba(202, 33, 43, 0.7), -1.8em -1.8em 0 0em #CA212B; } }window.loaderTimer = setTimeout(function(){ var $div = document.createElement("div"); $div.id = "start-loader"; $div.innerHTML = "Loading "; document.body.appendChild($div); }, 1500); Choose a region:usruuabrsefrAdd sourcesBookmarksChange passwordUpdate profile pictureLog outSign UpLogin© Anews inc.
